DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effects of VSL#3 on symptoms associated with diarrhea predominant IBS
DOC.brief_title: Dose Ranging Study With the Probiotic Combination (VSL#3) in Diarrhea IBS
DOC.detailed_description: The study will evaluate 2 doses of VSL#3 and placebo over a 4 week period in patients presenting with diarrhea predominant IBS symptoms.
DOC.criteria: IBS diarrhea < 18 years of age Pregnancy/breast feeding concomitant medications to reduce bowel function
